products.name: Summit Seeker 2-Person Tent
products.description: Lightweight and durable tent for backpacking. Quick setup, waterproof fly. Perfect for mild to moderate weather conditions.

products.name: Family Basecamp 6-Person Tent
products.description: Large, multi-room tent with standing height and ventilation. Ideal for family holidays and long stays.

products.name: Ultra-Light Bivy Sack
products.description: Minimalist, waterproof shelter for solo fast-and-light adventures. Extremely packable.

products.name: Cozy Cloud 20F Sleeping Bag
products.description: Ultralight mummy sleeping bag, rated for 20°F (-7°C). Synthetic insulation, compressible stuff sack included. Great for spring and fall camping.

products.name: Summer Breeze Sleeping Bag
products.description: Rectangular sleeping bag rated for 40°F (4°C). Cotton lining, machine washable. Perfect for car camping and summer nights.

products.name: Double-Wide Sleeping Bag
products.description: Extra-large sleeping bag for two adults. Fleece lined for ultimate comfort. Ideal for couples.

products.name: Inflatable Sleeping Pad
products.description: Insulated and comfortable sleeping pad. R-Value of 4.2 for three-season use.

products.name: Trailblazer 60L Backpack
products.description: High-capacity hiking backpack with adjustable frame and multiple compartments. Hydration bladder compatible. Ideal for multi-day treks.

products.name: Day Hiker 25L Pack
products.description: Compact day pack for essentials, with external gear loops and airflow back panel.

products.name: Portable Camp Stove (Propane)
products.description: Compact and efficient propane stove with adjustable flame. Boils water in minutes. Essential for cooking meals in the backcountry.

products.name: Ultralight Titanium Cook Pot
products.description: Single-person titanium cooking pot and lid. Extremely light, perfect for minimalist backpacking.

products.name: Complete Camp Cookware Set
products.description: Non-stick pots, pans, and utensils for group camping. Includes carrying bag.

products.name: Rechargeable LED Lantern
products.description: Bright and long-lasting LED lantern with adjustable brightness settings. USB rechargeable. Perfect for illuminating your camp.

products.name: Headlamp Pro 500 Lumen
products.description: High-power waterproof headlamp with multiple modes (red light, strobe, focused beam).

products.name: Folding Camp Chair Deluxe
products.description: Padded, oversized folding chair with cup holder and side pocket. Max weight 150kg.

products.name: Portable Hammock Single
products.description: Lightweight nylon hammock with carabiners and tree straps included. Ideal for relaxation.

products.name: Fire Starter Kit (Ferro Rod)
products.description: Reliable waterproof fire starting tool, includes striker and tinder bundle. Essential safety gear.

products.name: Biodegradable Camp Soap
products.description: Concentrated multi-use soap for dishes, hands, and laundry. Safe for use outdoors.

products.name: Water Filter Pump System
products.description: High-flow pump filter system removes bacteria and protozoa. Suitable for multiple users.

products.name: Collapsible Water Carrier 10L
products.description: Durable folding container for carrying and storing water at the campsite.

products.name: First Aid Kit Pro
products.description: Comprehensive kit covering trauma, minor injuries, and common ailments. Suitable for multi-day trips.

products.name: Sun Shelter Tarp
products.description: Lightweight polyester tarp for sun and rain protection. Includes stakes and cord.
